projects.title: My components (still a wip)
projects.description: An experimental site where I collect useful code snippets and components that I've found throught the years
projects.info: A website that I wanted to build as an experiment, not using any build tools and npm modules and just using plain js, css and html (importing packages through cdn). Aside from that this is a website where I collect random useful code snippets and components that I've found or built throughout the years.

projects.title: My webpage
projects.description: My personal webpage that you're probably reading this on.
projects.info: My personal website that I built with Astro which I have come to love. I used vanilla css and I focused on it being very accessible.

projects.title: Set & Forget
projects.description: Random password number generator and numbers game.
projects.info: Website I built to create a random number password and then having you play a number game to make you forget it. A way to stop myself from exit the screen time on my phone

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A small weather app built with Angular
projects.info: A simple weather app I built with Angular, just to give it a go.

projects.title: Lowrez Wrassle
projects.description: A low resolution multiplayer game for the web, built with Godot
projects.info: A low resolution game that I made with the lowrezjam boundaries (but not for the jam). Created with Godot game engine.

projects.title: Workout generator
projects.description: A site to randomize a workout, built with React
projects.info: A simple workout generator I built with React, TypeScript and sass.

projects.title: Circl'r
projects.description: A iPhone game built with Godot
projects.info: A game that I made for iPhone and iPad created with Godot game engine. That is now living on Itch.

projects.title: Pomodoro Timer
projects.description: A pomodoro timer built with vanilla js
projects.info: A simple pomodorotimer that I built in vanilla Javascript.

projects.title: BPM Counter
projects.description: A BPM counter built with vanilla js
projects.info: A very simple heartbeat counter that I made with Javascript as an examination project for my webdevelopment course.
